title: 4 new-age tech stocks that can be bought in this correction: Dipan Mehta - Economic Times
content:
1. 4 new-age tech stocks that can be bought in this correction: Dipan Mehta  Economic Times
  2. Explosive Top Tech Stocks to Buy to Gain Massive Incomes  Analytics Insight
  3. New Age Tech Stocks Take A Beating From Their Respective Highs  Times Now
  4. Tech Sell-Off: 1 Growth Stock To Buy, and 1 To Sell  The Motley Fool
  5. View Full coverage on Google News
description: “One should have some of these new-age digital companies in the portfolio. They are the future. They are going to be multibaggers going ahead. It is just that we do not know at this point of time which will be the winners.  It could be Nykaa. It could be Paytm or Policybazaar, it is difficult to say because these companies are constantly evolving. ”
